name: #JustGrandpaThings
description:
#JustGrandpaThings - become your very own Grandpa for seven days!

Created as an entry for the Big Awful Jam 2016

Complete grandfatherly tasks, such as cleaning your dentures, eating werthers originals and playing golf!

Controls
- 100% mouse control - no keyboard required!! Even your grandpa could play it!

Options
- F1, F2, F3, F4 - Adjust screen size (windowed mode)
- F11 - Toggle fullscreen

Completion stats
- Jam Length - 1 month (1 Jul - 31 Jul 2016)
- Development Length - ~2 weeks
